## Prerequisites

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(nycflights13)
```


## Load the data

```{r}
data(weather)
```

## Create the plot

```{r}
ggplot(data = weather, mapping = aes(x = temp)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 10, color = "white", fill = "red")
```
